General.Name: Topscore Fashion
General.Description: Topscore Fashion Co., Ltd. engages in fashion shoes and apparel business, and mobile Internet marketing business in China. It offers mid-to-high-end fashion women's shoes, and apparel accessories, such as leather, fur, feathers, and footwear products under the KISSCAT, ZSAZSAZSU, tigrisso, MUSTHAVE, KissKitty, O bag, and Patricia brands. The company also offers mobile Internet digital marketing, such as mobile application distribution and promotion; and programmatic delivery of mobile Internet advertisements. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Guangzhou, China.

1.Name: Ms. Lu  Yang
1.Title: Sec. of the Board of Directors
